meanings.definition: Relating to the jaws or jawbone.
meanings.sent1: The gnathal structure of the skull supports the teeth.
meanings.sent2: The dentist studied the gnathal alignment of the patient's teeth.
meanings.sent3: The gnathal development of the dinosaur skull fascinated the researchers.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the gnathal bone of a predator.
meanings.sent5: The gnathal shape of the mask made it look fierce and intimidating.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the lower jaw.
meanings.sent1: The gnathal pain made it difficult to chew.
meanings.sent2: The gnathal joint allows for smooth movement of the lower jaw.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his gnathal strength came from eating too many nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her words hit him like a gnathal punch, leaving him speechless.
meanings.sent5: The gnathal position of the hinge determined the jaw's range of motion.

meanings.sent1: The gnathal surgery corrected the alignment of the mandible.
meanings.sent2: The gnathal bone provides structure to the mandible.
meanings.sent3: The gnathal shape of the jaw made it easier to crack nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as unyielding as the gnathal strength of the mandible.
meanings.sent5: The gnathal angle of the mandible affected her ability to speak clearly.
